mapper.insert: insert into chracter_basic (date, character_name, world_name, character_gender, character_class, character_class_level, character_level, character_exp, character_exp_rate, character_guild_name, character_image) values (#{date}, #{character_name}, #{world_name}, #{character_gender}, #{character_class}, #{character_class_level}, #{character_level}, #{character_exp}, #{character_exp_rate}, #{character_guild_name}, #{character_image})
